job.title: Software Developer
job.description: <p>Centurion is seeking a <strong>Software Developer with a focus on Java-based algorithm development</strong> to be part of a dynamic team. We are a collaborative environment that fosters advanced research, concept exploration, product development and interaction with the nation’s leading aviation subject matter experts. We pride ourselves on a work environment where employees can succeed.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><p>• Evaluation and ownership of existing frameworks to design, develop and test Algorithms</p><p>• Apply technical creativity to develop and implement new tools to analyze and improve algorithm performance</p><p>• Create new algorithms based on a sequence of requirements</p><p>• Provide support in the areas of data extraction, transformation and load, data mapping, data extraction, analytical support, operational support, database support, and maintenance support of data and associated systems</p><p>• Apply troubleshooting skills to challenging problems</p><p>• Develop standards, procedures and guidelines to ensure algorithm performance is consistent or improving</p><p>• Develop highly scalable application infrastructure that powers data collection and processing services</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><p>• BS degree or higher in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering or related technical field</p><p>• Experience designing, developing and implementing mathematical programming Algorithms in one or more of the following languages/tools:</p><p>• Experience working in Windows and Linux OS environments and simple scripting (grep, shell, bash, etc)</p><p>• Experience with Java or another object-oriented programming language</p><p>• Solid understanding of programming principles, designs, and patterns, and associated tooling and frameworks</p><p>• Experience with querying databases (Oracle and/or Mongo)</p><p>• Excellent analytical, data mining, troubleshooting and problem-solving skills</p><p>• Strong collaborator and experienced working in dynamic teams working</p><p>• Strong written and oral communication skills</p><p>• Ability to handle multiple competing priorities in a fast-paced environment</p><p>• Must be a quick learner and self-motivated</p><p>• 3+ years of experience required</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Position Details:</strong></p><p>• Clearance: Ability to Obtain a Public Trust</p><p>• US Citizenship or Authorization to work in US required</p><p>• Travel: &lt; 10% (CONUS)</p><p>• Centurion Consulting Group, LLC is an Equal Opportunity Employer EOE M/F/D/V</p><p>• No third parties or subcontractors</p>
